features: 🥰Exciting Gameplay Variety: Our handheld game console offers four fun game modes: Stage Mode, Memory Mode, Score Mode and Multiplayer Mode, this captivating electronic handheld gaming toy serves as the ideal travel companion for children and teenagers aged 3 to 12. It provides endless enjoyment and challenges for players of all ages. Get ready for an epic gaming adventure with our handheld game console!

🤝Crafted with premium ABS and silicone materials, this gaming console stands tall in durability and resilience. Its ergonomic design, compact size, and featherweight construction guarantee a gratifying hold, even during marathon gaming sessions. Making the device not only last longer but also shielding your hands from fatigue. Get ready to immerse yourself in a gaming experience that goes beyond expectations.

🥇Elevate your gaming experience with our minimalist design, providing an immersive sensory journey with enhanced materials and responsive buttons. Improved button sensitivity challenges memory and reflexes, while the satisfying pop sound adds fun for all ages. Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience with our updated version!

😇Simple and Easy to Play: With just four buttons including sound, power, mode switch, and a prominent back button, this game popper features a sensor device, players only need to press the pop-up to continuously turn off the light, and then press the confirmation button on the back. Its straightforward operation is easy to learn, making it suitable for users of all ages.

🥰Compact and Versatile: Measuring 4.3x5.5x1.7 inches, this handheld gaming device is conveniently portable, ideal for traveling with parents and kids, ensuring constant entertainment. It suits all ages, offering stress relief and enhancing children's logic. Reusable and easy to clean, it's a perfect choice for school rewards, holidays, and birthdays.
body.description: In the modern high-tech era, children are increasingly addicted to electronic screens and lack opportunities to experience traditional games. At the same time, traditional whack-a-mole toys usually require large areas of space and are not portable, making it difficult to enjoy games anytime and anywhere. pleasure.A new playmate for children as they grow, releasing their childlike innocence and laughter!Quick Push Game - Whack-A-Mole toy, your child's new play partner. Through the integration of modern technology, it brings children a new experience of traditional games and releases their childlike innocence and laughter.1. Anytime, anywhere - fun gaming, no restrictions on venue!This game console is not restricted by the venue and can be used anytime and anywhere. The compact and lightweight design allows you to provide your children with a happy whack-a-mole experience at home, outdoors or at a friend's house, anytime and anywhere.2. Quick push-responsive, increasing gaming fun!The fast push design increases the difficulty and fun of the game. Children need to react quickly and improve their hand-eye coordination to make the game more challenging and more exciting for them.This game console can not only provide children with happy time, but also a way for parents and children to interact. Specification:Recommended age: 3-12 years oldModel: whack-a-mole gameMaterial: ABSProduct size: 11*14*4.5cm/4.3*5.5*1.7 inchesBattery usage: 3X1.5vAA batteries (included)Product Mode: Challenge Mode, Memory Mode, Score Mode, Multiplayer Mode
